title: Laminar Service
description: High throughput service that helps distributed applications cooperate and coordinate by distributing jobs among them without conflicts.
Distributed applications can request for the next job and Laminar will guarantee sequential access to the job pool while providing some nifty features like:

• Maintain uniqueness in the job pool
  • Allow updates to the existing jobs
  • Prioritize some jobs over the others
  • Delay some jobs for a given amount of time
